ygData.subject: Re: crushbone
ygData.msgSnippet: Only small bronze armor is dropped by DBs.  You have to go to another place for large bronze.  And you have to have a pretty good group of 24 to 25th lvl
ygData.messageBody:
Only small bronze armor is dropped by DBs. You have to go to another place
for large bronze. And you have to have a pretty good group of 24 to 25th
lvl players to get it.

The cash from Lake Rathe is good tho.

Dyvim Kincaid
Stormriders of Cazic Thule
